name: CinaP CinataS
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2. The theme was: REWIND!

You're in a cubicle.
You've got one job.
It is simple:

Listen to THE VOICE.
Interpret what IT SAYS!
Spread ITS will through...
CASSETTE TAPES!!

Controls:
Mouse - Move Your Hand
Left Mouse Button - Grab/Click

Credits:

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - programming, beautifying
Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - programming, audio magicks
Alexander Kopiy (@kopiy_that) - 3d art, voice sounds

Disclaimer:
The Headlines are blatantly ripped off of heavily influenced by The Onion and the inspiration to us all that is Florida Man.
